sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Validators,FormGroup, FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'instagramlogin'; constructor(){} loginform=new FormGroup({ "email":new FormControl(null,([Validators.required,Validators.email])), "password":new FormControl(null,Validators.compose([Validators.required,Validators.maxLength(32),Validators.minLength(8)])) }) submit(){ console.log(this.loginform.value); alert("Form is submiited!"); this.loginform.reset(); } get Email(){ return this.loginform.get('email'); } get Password(){ return this.loginform.get('password'); } } Document

Instagram


Email is required Email is not correct
Password is required
